Field.Label: Allows sending an arbitrary command to the Roku device for use in debugging commands. The code will be sent just as if from the other actions, but with any value typed here.
This function will dump the details of a plugin device to the Indigo Event Log to aid in debugging and forum posts.

Perform a UPnP search in an attempt to find devices available on the network and display those in your browser. This may help in debugging devices found or not found on the network during device setup and configuration
Note that some devices will only respond once in a set amount of time; you may want to wait a few minutes and try again if your are missing a device(s).
NOTE: This function may take up to 30 seconds to complete upon hitting the Run Debug button; your results will be launched in a browser window on the server.
